Package gtu.automation_system_for_cargo_company

Class AutomationSystemForCargoCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • gtu.automation_system_for_cargo_company.AutomationSystemForCargoCompany
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanySystem, PrintableInConsole
    public class AutomationSystemForCargoCompany
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrintableInConsole, CompanySystem
    The AutomationSystemForCargoCompany program is used to help cargo companies to automate and organize their system. They can create as many of these systems as needed. Each of them will contain users such as administrators, branch employees, transporatation personnel and customers.
    Since:
    2020-02-21
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Djuro Radusinovic 171044095

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addAdministrator​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname)
      Whoever is in control of the system is able to add adminstrators to it System's user interface cannot be reached before the administrator is added since it is the one who is able to control a certain system's users
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
